outputs.output_descr: Subproject for the implementation of a Regulatory Framework for HCFCs including implementation of a control system for ODS trade, use and handling of equipment and products, enhanced capacity of customs and strengthening of in country capacity to organize technicians; Sensitization of the population involving workshops and awareness campaigns; servicing and maintenance of the Refrigeration Sector including strengthening of capacities of technicians, provision of equipment and tools, and reinforcement of centers in provision of training; and Monitoring under which costs for consultants, equipment and other items are regrouped.

project_descr: This project is in line with the obligations that the Government has assumed based on the Decision XIX/6 of the Nineteenth Meeting of the Parties that accelerated the phase out of HCFCs in both Article 5 and non-Article 5 countries.
